## MixedBy - Mixed Design (Between-Subjects and Within-Subjects) Tutorial with Data

### Enter Data

```{r}
Factor <- c(1,1,1,1,2,2,2,2)
Time1 <- c(0,0,3,5,1,3,6,6)
Time2 <- c(4,7,4,9,3,1,6,6)
Time3 <- c(4,9,6,9,3,3,6,8)
Factor <- factor(Factor,levels=c(1,2),labels=c("Group1","Group2"))
MixedData <- data.frame(Factor,Time1,Time2,Time3)
```

### Analyses of Multiple Variables

#### Confidence Intervals for the Means

```{r}
estimateMeansBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor)
```

```{r}
estimateMeansBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,conf.level=.99)
```

#### Plots of Confidence Intervals for the Means

```{r,MixedBy-MeansA}
plotMeansBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor)
```

```{r,MixedBy-MeansB}
plotMeansBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,conf.level=.99,mu=5,rope=c(3,7)) 
```

#### Significance Tests for the Means

```{r}
testMeansBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor)
```

```{r}
testMeansBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,mu=5)
```

#### Effect Size for the Means

```{r}
standardizeMeansBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor)
```

```{r}
standardizeMeansBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,mu=5,conf.level=.99)
```

### Analyses of a Variable Comparison

#### Confidence Interval for the Mean Difference

```{r}
estimateDifferenceBy(Time1,Time2,by=Factor)
```

```{r}
estimateDifferenceBy(Time1,Time2,by=Factor,conf.level=.99)
```

#### Plots of Confidence Intervals for the Mean Difference

```{r,MixedBy-DifferenceA}
plotDifferenceBy(Time1,Time2,by=Factor)
```

```{r,MixedBy-DifferenceB}
plotDifferenceBy(Time1,Time2,by=Factor,conf.level=.99,rope=c(-2,2))
```

#### Significance Test for the Mean Difference

```{r}
testDifferenceBy(Time1,Time2,by=Factor)
```

```{r}
testDifferenceBy(Time1,Time2,by=Factor,mu=-2)
```

#### Effect Size for the Mean Difference

```{r}
standardizeDifferenceBy(Time1,Time2,by=Factor)
```

```{r}
standardizeDifferenceBy(Time1,Time2,by=Factor,conf.level=.99)
```

### Analyses of a Variable Contrast

```{r}
T1vsOthers <- c(-1,.5,.5)
```

#### Confidence Interval for the Contrast

```{r}
estimateContrastBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,contrast=T1vsOthers)
```

```{r}
estimateContrastBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,contrast=T1vsOthers,conf.level=.99)
```

#### Plots of Confidence Intervals for a Contrast

```{r,MixedBy-ContrastA}
plotContrastBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,contrast=T1vsOthers)
```

```{r,MixedBy-ContrastB}
plotContrastBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,contrast=T1vsOthers,labels=c("Time1","Others"),conf.level=.99,rope=c(-2,2))
```

#### Significance Test for the Contrast

```{r}
testContrastBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,contrast=T1vsOthers)
```

```{r}
testContrastBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,contrast=T1vsOthers,mu=4)
```

#### Effect Size for the Contrast

```{r}
standardizeContrastBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,contrast=T1vsOthers)
```

```{r}
standardizeContrastBy(Time1,Time2,Time3,by=Factor,contrast=T1vsOthers,conf.level=.99)
```
